00045                 public function logout($error_message="")
00046                 {
00047                         // kill session and array
00048                         session_unset();
00049                         session_destroy();
00050                         session_regenerate_id(true);
00051                         
00052                         // savely remove complete array and reload page
00053                         $_SESSION = array();
00054                         $this->return_to("./");
00055                 }

00066                 public function login()
00067                 {
00068                         if (isset($_POST["LoginUsername"]) && isset($_POST["LoginPassword"]))
00069                                 {
00070                                         $username = trim($_POST["LoginUsername"]);
00071                                         $password = md5(trim($_POST["LoginPassword"]));
00072                                         if (empty($username))
00073                                                 {
00074                                                         throw new Exception("Zugriff verweigert! Kein Benutzername eingegeben!",301);
00075                                                 }
00076                                 }
00077                         else
00078                                 {
00079                                         // if no post values for user and pass, init save state (guest)
00080                                         $this->logout();
00081                                 }
00082                                 
00083                         // check, if user with md5-pass exists in database
00084                         $query  = "SELECT u.mid, u.gid, u.email, u.firstname, u.lastname, g.groupname ";
00085                         $query .= "FROM tr_users u LEFT JOIN ";
00086                         $query .= "tr_groups g USING ( gid ) ";
00087                         $query .= "WHERE u.email = '$username' AND u.password = '$password';";
00088                         $found = $_SESSION[$_SESSION["_SqlType"]]->query_first($query);
00089                         
00090                         if (! isset($found["mid"]))
00091                                 {
00092                                         throw new Exception("Die Email oder das Kennwort ist falsch!",302);
00093                                 }
00094                                 
00095                         $_SESSION["_UserData"] = $found;
00096                         
00097                         // save current timestamp and ip to verify session
00098                         $_SESSION["_UserData"]["timestamp"] = time();
00099                         $_SESSION["_UserData"]["ip"]        = $_SERVER["REMOTE_ADDR"];
00100                         
00101                         $this->extend();
00102                         
00103                         return true;
00104                 }

00118                 public function passwd()
00119                 {
00120                         if (isset($_POST["LoginUsername"]))
00121                                 {
00122                                         $username = trim($_POST["LoginUsername"]);
00123                                         if (empty($username))
00124                                                 {
00125                                                         throw new Exception("Sie haben keine Emailadresse angegeben!",303);
00126                                                 }
00127                                 }
00128                         else
00129                                 {
00130                                         throw new Exception("Sie haben keine Emailadresse angegeben!",303);
00131                                 }
00132                                 
00133                         // check, if user with md5-pass exists in database
00134                         $query  = "SELECT mid, firstname, lastname FROM tr_users WHERE email = '$username';";
00135                         $result = $_SESSION[$_SESSION["_SqlType"]]->query_first($query);
00136                         
00137                         // only if one hit
00138                         if (! isset($result["mid"]))
00139                                 {
00140                                         throw new Exception("Die Emailadresse '$username' ist mir unbekannt!",304);
00141                                 }
00142                         else
00143                                 {
00144                                         $passwd  = $this->generate_password();
00145                                         $passmd5 = md5($passwd);
00146                                         $query   = "UPDATE tr_users SET password = '$passmd5' WHERE email = '$username';";
00147                                         $_SESSION[$_SESSION["_SqlType"]]->query($query);
00148                                         $count   = $_SESSION[$_SESSION["_SqlType"]]->affected_rows();
00149                                         
00150                                         // successful updated database
00151                                         if ($count == 1)
00152                                                 {
00153                                                         $tpl = "passwd.email.html";
00154                                                         
00155                                                         $email = new Email(array($tpl,"Sie haben Ihr Passwort vergessen?"));
00156                                                         $email->set_sender("omega2k@omega2k.de","Webmaster");
00157                                                         $email->set_to($username, $result["firstname"]." ".$result["lastname"]);
00158                                                         $email->assign($tpl,"{{URL}}","http://www.omega2k.de/~omega2k/TimeRecording/");
00159                                                         $email->assign($tpl,"{{USER}}",$username);
00160                                                         $email->assign($tpl,"{{PASS}}",$passwd);
00161                                                         if ($email->send())
00162                                                                 {
00163                                                                         throw new Exception("Es wurde ein neues Passwort an '$username' geschickt!",305);
00164                                                                 }
00165                                                         else
00166                                                                 {
00167                                                                         throw new Exception("Die Email konnte nicht gesendet werden! Wir arbeiten daran...",306);
00168                                                                 }
00169                                                 }
00170                                         else
00171                                                 {
00172                                                         throw new Exception("Es gab Probleme mit der Datenbank! Wir arbeiten daran...",307);
00173                                                 }
00174                                 }
00175                 }

00189                 public function book()
00190                 {
00191                         $ignore = false;
00192                         $symid  = (isset($_GET["id"])) ? intval($_GET["id"]) : -1;
00193                         $symid  = (isset($_POST["id"]) && $symid == -1) ? intval($_POST["id"]) : $symid;
00194                         
00195                         
00196                         // for async booking, check if token is valid
00197                         if (isset($_SESSION["_AsyncToken"]) && isset($_POST["ig"]))
00198                                 {
00199                                         $ignore = ($_SESSION["_AsyncToken"] == $_POST["ig"]);
00200                                         unset($_SESSION["_AsyncToken"]);
00201                                 }
00202                                 
00203                         if (! $this->is_user())
00204                                 {
00205                                         throw new Exception("Sie sind kein bekannter Benutzer!",308);
00206                                 }
00207                         else if ($symid < 0 || $symid > 1)
00208                                 {
00209                                         throw new Exception("Keine zugelassene Buchungs-Aktion!",309);
00210                                 }
00211                         else
00212                                 {
00213                                         $mid    = $_SESSION["_UserData"]["mid"];
00214                                         
00215                                         // check if booking is out of cycle
00216                                         $query  = "SELECT bookid, stamp_1, ( UNIX_TIMESTAMP() - UNIX_TIMESTAMP( stamp_1 ) ) AS away, stamp_2 FROM tr_bookings ";
00217                                         $query .= "WHERE mid = '$mid' ORDER BY bookid DESC;";
00218                                         $last   = $_SESSION[$_SESSION["_SqlType"]]->query_first($query);
00219                                         
00220                                         $case_1 = ($symid == 1 && isset($last["stamp_1"]) && $last["stamp_2"] == NULL);
00221                                         $case_2 = ($last["away"] > ($_SESSION["_MaxWorkingH"] * 3600) && $symid == 0);
00222                                         
00223                                         // case_1: new check in but last check out is missing (async booking!)
00224                                         if ($case_1 && $ignore)
00225                                                 {
00226                                                         $query  = "INSERT INTO tr_bookings ( mid ) ";
00227                                                         $query .= "VALUES ( '$mid' );";
00228                                                         $_SESSION[$_SESSION["_SqlType"]]->query($query);
00229                                                 }
00230                                         // case_1: new check in but last check out is missing
00231                                         else if ($case_1)
00232                                                 {
00233                                                         $_SESSION["_AsyncToken"] = md5($this->generate_password(10));
00234                                                         
00235                                                         $question  = "<form action=\"./\" method=\"post\" id=\"question\">";
00236                                                         $question .= "<input type=\"hidden\" name=\"ig\"     value=\"".$_SESSION["_AsyncToken"]."\"/>";
00237                                                         $question .= "<input type=\"hidden\" name=\"id\"     value=\"$symid\"/>";
00238                                                         $question .= "<input type=\"hidden\" name=\"page\"   value=\"home\" />";
00239                                                         $question .= "<input type=\"hidden\" name=\"sid\"    value=\"".session_id()."\" />";
00240                                                         $question .= "<input type=\"hidden\" name=\"action\" value=\"book\" />";
00241                                                         $question .= "<input type=\"submit\" name=\"submit\" value=\"Ignorieren\" />";
00242                                                         $question .= "<input type=\"button\" onclick=\"location.href='./?page=home';\" value=\"Abbrechen\" />";
00243                                                         $question .= "</form>";
00244                                                         
00245                                                         throw new Exception("Azyklische Buchungen sind nicht zugelassen!$question",311);
00246                                                 }
00247                                         // case_2: more than maximum hours
00248                                         else if ($case_2)
00249                                                 {
00250                                                         $message  = "Sie haben die Arbeitszeit von maximal ".$_SESSION["_MaxWorkingH"];
00251                                                         $message .= " Stunden &uuml;berschritten!";
00252                                                         throw new Exception($message,312);
00253                                                 }
00254                                         // update going stamp only
00255                                         else if ($symid == 0)
00256                                                 {
00257                                                         $query  = "UPDATE tr_bookings SET stamp_2 = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ";
00258                                                         $query .= "WHERE bookid = '".$last["bookid"]."';";
00259                                                         $_SESSION[$_SESSION["_SqlType"]]->query($query);
00260                                                 }
00261                                         // insert new stamp
00262                                         else if ($symid == 1)
00263                                                 {
00264                                                         $query  = "INSERT INTO tr_bookings ( mid ) ";
00265                                                         $query .= "VALUES ( '$mid' );";
00266                                                         $_SESSION[$_SESSION["_SqlType"]]->query($query);
00267                                                 }
00268                                         else
00269                                                 {
00270                                                         throw new Exception("Unbekannter Fehler!",399);
00271                                                 }
00272                                 }
00273                 }

00322                 public function generate_password($length = 8)
00323                 {
00324                         $this->randomize();
00325                         $password = "";
00326                         $possible = "0123456789abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXY";
00327                         $i = 0;
00328                         while ($i < $length)
00329                                 {
00330                                         $char = substr($possible, mt_rand(0, strlen($possible) - 1), 1);
00331                                         if (! strstr($password, $char))
00332                                                 {
00333                                                         $password .= $char;
00334                                                         $i++;
00335                                                 }
00336                                 }
00337                         return $password;
00338                 }

00349                 public function is_admin()
00350                 {
00351                         if (! isset($_SESSION["_UserData"]["gid"])) return false;
00352                         return ($_SESSION["_UserData"]["gid"] == 0);
00353                 }

00364                 public function is_accounting()
00365                 {
00366                         if (! isset($_SESSION["_UserData"]["gid"])) return false;
00367                         return ($_SESSION["_UserData"]["gid"] == 3);
00368                 }

00379                 public function is_user()
00380                 {
00381                         if (! isset($_SESSION["_UserData"]["gid"])) return false;
00382                         return ($_SESSION["_UserData"]["gid"] != 1);
00383                 }

00392                 public function return_to($url)
00393                 {
00394                         session_write_close();
00395                         header("Location: ".$url);
00396                         exit();
00397                 }
00398                 
00406                 public function extend()
00407                 {
00408                         if ($this->started())
00409                                 {
00410                                         if ($this->valid())
00411                                                 {
00412                                                         // extend session
00413                                                         $_SESSION["_UserData"]["timestamp"] = time();
00414                                                 }
00415                                         else
00416                                                 {
00417                                                         // kill session and logout
00418                                                         $this->logout("Ihre Session ist abgelaufen! Bitte neu anmelden...");
00419                                                 }
00420                                 }
00421                         else
00422                                 {
00423                                         $_SESSION["_UserData"]["ip"] = $_SERVER["REMOTE_ADDR"];
00424                                 }
00425                 }
00426                 
00436                 public function valid()
00437                 {
00438                         // no timestamp means never logged in
00439                         if (!isset($_SESSION["_UserData"]["timestamp"]))
00440                                 {
00441                                         return false;
00442                                 }
00443                         // if session timed out in case of inactivity, return false too
00444                         // or if ip-address has changed (may be intruder)
00445                         $away = (time() - $_SESSION["_UserData"]["timestamp"]);
00446                         return (($_SERVER["REMOTE_ADDR"] == $_SESSION["_UserData"]["ip"]) && ($away < $_SESSION["_TimeOut"]));
00447                 }
00448                 
00458                 public function started()
00459                 {
00460                         // only if having timestamp and ip return true
00461                         return (isset($_SESSION["_UserData"]["timestamp"]) && isset($_SESSION["_UserData"]["ip"]));
00462                 }
00463                 
00471                 public function randomize()
00472                 {
00473                         list($usec, $sec) = explode(' ', microtime());
00474                         mt_srand((float) $sec + ((float) $usec * 100000));
00475                 }

00489                 public function valid_email($email, $check_db = false)
00490                 {
00491                         $error = false;
00492                         
00493                         // avoid queries to mail servers, use session buffer
00494                         if (in_array($email, $_SESSION["_UserData"]["valid_mails"]))
00495                                 {
00496                                         return (! $check_db) ? true : $this->email_exists($email);
00497                                 }
00498                                 
00499                         $email = strtolower($email);
00500                         
00501                         // regex for checking syntactically correct email addresses
00502                         if (ereg("^[_a-z0-9-]+(\.[_a-z0-9-]+)*@[a-z0-9-]+(\.[a-z0-9-]+)*(\.[a-z]{2,6})$", $email))
00503                                 {
00504                                         list($username, $domain) = split('@', $email);
00505                                         $smtp = array("mail.$domain", "smtp.$domain");
00506                                         
00507                                         if (! function_exists("checkdnsrr"))
00508                                                 {
00509                                                         $error = true;
00510                                                         echo("function checkdnsrr() not found!\n");
00511                                                 }
00512                                         if (! function_exists("getmxrr"))
00513                                                 {
00514                                                         $error = true;
00515                                                         echo("function getmxrr() not found!\n");
00516                                                 }
00517                                         if (! function_exists("fsockopen"))
00518                                                 {
00519                                                         $error = true;
00520                                                         echo("function fsockopen() not found!\n");
00521                                                 }
00522                                                 
00523                                         if ($error) return false;
00524                                         
00525                                         // query MX-records
00526                                         if (@checkdnsrr($domain, "MX"))
00527                                                 {
00528                                                         $mx = array();
00529                                                         @getmxrr($domain, $mx);
00530                                                         foreach($mx as $mxs) array_push($smtp, $mxs);
00531                                                 }
00532                                         else
00533                                                 {
00534                                                         // unknown error, no MX-records?
00535                                                         return false;
00536                                                 }
00537                                                 
00538                                         // contact each server
00539                                         foreach($smtp as $server)
00540                                         {
00541                                                 if ($sock = @fsockopen($server, 25, $errno, $errstr, 3))
00542                                                         {
00543                                                                 if (ereg("^220", $output = fgets($sock, 1024)))
00544                                                                         {
00545                                                                                 fputs($sock, "HELO ".$_SERVER["HTTP_HOST"]."\r\n");
00546                                                                                 $out = fgets($sock, 1024);
00547                                                                                 fputs($sock, "MAIL FROM: <{$email}>\r\n");
00548                                                                                 $gfr = fgets($sock, 1024);
00549                                                                                 fputs($sock, "RCPT TO: <{$email}>\r\n");
00550                                                                                 $gto = fgets($sock, 1024);
00551                                                                                 fputs($sock, "QUIT\r\n");
00552                                                                                 fclose($sock);
00553                                                                                 
00554                                                                                 // if sender and recipient valid, TRUE
00555                                                                                 if ((ereg("^250", $gfr) && ereg("^250", $gto)) || (! empty($gfr) && ! ereg("unknown", $gfr)))
00556                                                                                         {
00557                                                                                                 array_push($_SESSION["_UserData"]["valid_mails"], $email);
00558                                                                                                 return (! $check_db) ? true : $this->email_exists($email);
00559                                                                                         }
00560                                                                         }
00561                                                         }
00562                                         }
00563                                         // all mailservers checked... no success, FAILED
00564                                 }
00565                         return false;
00566                 }
00567                 
00580                 private function get_mx_records($host, $type = "MX")
00581                 {
00582                         if (! empty($host))
00583                                 {
00584                                         $result = array();
00585                                         exec("nslookup -type=$type $host", $result);
00586                                         foreach($result as $line)
00587                                         {
00588                                                 if (eregi("^$host", $line))
00589                                                         {
00590                                                                 return $result;
00591                                                         }
00592                                         }
00593                                         return false;
00594                                 }
00595                         return false;
00596                 }
00597                 
00610                 public function is_secure_password($password, $min_len = 8)
00611                 {
00612                         return (strlen($password) >= $min_len
00613                                 && preg_match("@[A-Z]@", $password)
00614                                 && preg_match("@[a-z]@", $password)
00615                                 && preg_match("@[0-9]@", $password));
00616                 }
